title: There is still time

description: Barbara Ward, internationally known economist and author, acts as on-camera guide in this film about Quebec, a city chosen for its intrinsic beauty and its particular stage of development. She discusses the good and bad effects of modernization on a city, and selects locations to illustrate her arguments.
